name: Jammer
description:
Have you ever wonder what would it be to play world's worst game ever?

If you do, now you can!

Jammer is a little game I did for the Mini Jam 50, whose limitation is to only have one level. So I did what every human with less than 2 IQ would do.

A infinite* top-down shooter that consists on you (player, a blue triangle) killing bad guys (red triangles**).

It's really buggy because I had almost no time to work on this (school stuff.) and it's my first jam ever so bare with me if I did something wrong. (which... could be everything???)

The game is a little bit early (because, again, had no time) with only one type of enemy and terrible sprites (let's be honest, I'm not an artist.)

Controls:

W-A-S-D: Movement.
Mouse: Look around, LMB to shoot.

Being serious, I'd be glad if you gave this thing a chance, because it'd mean that someone notices me and that's cool!

You can also send your feedback, because I'm gonna update this when I have time and am not working on any other proyect. I know this is obviously not going to be but I think it's pretty good for my first jam.

*Not infinite sometimes because of a bug I haven't actually fixed.
**By the way they look like nachos.
